cleaned_text: This video is about wrong dietary habits which leads to obesity & diabetes as we are working to reduce the pain & complications of obesity & diabetes patients since 12 years we have decided to share our experiences with peoples across the world... Kindly share this video with the peoples suffering from obesity, diabetes & contribute in our mission of healthy India...
